creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two white paneled cotton huipil; woven on a back strap loom; small purple and red zoomorphic brocaded figures; embroidery in red and purple putting the two panels together; purple hand embroidery at neckline
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
